alert.note: Alert for Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:19PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Wilkin and east central Richland Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 417 PM CDT, broadcast media reported a strong thunderstorm near Wahpeton. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Funnel clouds will be possible with these storms as well. SOURCE...Broadcast media. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Brushvale around 445 PM CDT. Wahpeton around 450 PM CDT. Breckenridge around 500 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
